entry.em: ..COLD WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST WEDNESDAY

entry.data:
CLEAR THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 7 ABOVE
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 4 BELOW AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 11
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 40
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
